meanings.definition: The state or condition of being unhealthy.
meanings.sent1: The unhealthiness of his diet led to weight gain.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise can help reduce unhealthiness in the body.
meanings.sent3: The unhealthiness of the situation was evident in the lack of nutritious food available.
meanings.sent4: The unhealthiness of the city's air pollution was a growing concern for residents.
meanings.sent5: The doctor emphasized the importance of avoiding unhealthiness to maintain a strong immune system.

meanings.definition: Lack of good health or physical well-being.
meanings.sent1: Her constant fatigue was a sign of unhealthiness.
meanings.sent2: The unhealthiness of smoking is well-documented.
meanings.sent3: The unhealthiness of skipping meals was evident in his low energy levels.
meanings.sent4: The unhealthiness of the neglected garden mirrored the owner's neglect of self-care.
meanings.sent5: The unhealthiness of the fast food industry is a concern for public health officials.
